## 1. Summary: Node Count Evolution

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = here::here())
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.showtext = TRUE, dpi = 300)
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)
```

```{r load-data, echo=F, message=F}
# Path Configuration
base_dir     <- "/Volumes/SanDisk4TB/SternBrocot-data"
summary_path <- file.path(base_dir, "04_erasure_distance_summary.csv.gz")
agg_dir      <- file.path(base_dir, "02_erasure_distance_densities")
nodes_dir    <- file.path(base_dir, "03_erasure_distance_density_nodes")

# Load Summary
dt_summary <- data.table::fread(summary_path)

# Calculate is_eigenstate and handle NAs immediately
dt_summary[, is_eigenstate := (floor(normalized_momentum / pi) == node_count)]
dt_summary[is.na(is_eigenstate), is_eigenstate := FALSE]
```

```{r summary-plot, echo=FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=6, warning=FALSE}
dt_plot <- copy(dt_summary)
dt_plot[is.na(node_count), node_count := 0]

ggplot(dt_plot, aes(x = normalized_momentum, y = node_count)) +
  # Adding alpha for transparency and jitter to handle overlapping points if node_count is dense
  geom_point(aes(color = is_eigenstate), 
             size = 1.2, 
             alpha = 0.3, 
             na.rm = TRUE) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("TRUE" = "red", "FALSE" = "black")) +
  labs(
    title = "Detected Nodes vs. Momentum (100k Point Scan)",
    subtitle = "Red points: Eigenstates (P ≈ nπ). Black points: Intermediate states.",
    x = "Momentum P", y = "Node Count n", color = "Eigenstate?"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  guides(color = guide_legend(override.aes = list(alpha = 1, size = 3)))
```

## 2. Representative Diagnostic Scan (First 8 Eigenstates: n=0 to n=7)
```{r diagnostic-scan, echo=FALSE, results='asis', fig.width=8, fig.height=4}
# 1. Selection Logic: 
# Filter for node counts 0 through 7.
# For each n, pick the momentum P closest to the ideal eigenstate (P = n * pi).
dt_representatives <- dt_summary[node_count %in% 0:7][
  order(abs(normalized_momentum - node_count * pi))
][, .SD[1], by = node_count]

# 2. Sort by node_count for the report flow
setorder(dt_representatives, node_count)

for (i in seq_len(nrow(dt_representatives))) {
  p_val  <- dt_representatives$normalized_momentum[i]
  n_val  <- dt_representatives$node_count[i]
  is_eig <- dt_representatives$is_eigenstate[i]
  
  # Ensure is_eig is not NA
  is_eig_safe <- isTRUE(is_eig)
  
  p_str  <- sprintf("%013.6f", p_val)
  d_path <- file.path(agg_dir, sprintf("erasure_distance_density_P_%s.csv.gz", p_str))
  n_path <- file.path(nodes_dir, sprintf("erasure_distance_nodes_P_%s.csv.gz", p_str))
  
  if (file.exists(d_path)) {
    h_pts <- data.table::fread(d_path)
    n_pts <- if(file.exists(n_path)) data.table::fread(n_path)[!is.na(coordinate_q)] else data.table::data.table()
    
    bw <- if(nrow(h_pts) > 1) diff(h_pts$coordinate_q[1:2]) else 0.1
    
    # Label as "Eigenstate" if it falls in the expected [n*pi, (n+1)*pi) range
    type_label <- if(is_eig_safe) "Eigenstate" else "Closest Representative (Non-Eigenstate)"
    
    p <- ggplot(h_pts, aes(coordinate_q, density_count)) +
      geom_col(fill = "black", alpha = 0.2, width = bw) +
      geom_step(direction = "mid", color = "black", linewidth = 0.3) +
      coord_cartesian(xlim = c(-p_val, p_val)) +
      labs(title = sprintf("Node Count: %d | %s", n_val, type_label),
           subtitle = sprintf("P = %f (Ideal Eigenstate P ≈ %.2f)", p_val, n_val * pi),
           x = "q", y = "Occupancy") +
      theme_minimal(base_family = "mono")
    
    if (nrow(n_pts) > 0) {
      p <- p + geom_point(data = n_pts, aes(coordinate_q, density_count), color = "red", size = 2)
    }
    
    cat("\n\n### Node Count:", n_val, " (P =", p_val, ")\n")
    print(p)
    cat("\n\n---\n\n")
  }
}
```
